mapper.insert: INSERT INTO `order` (order_num,order_created_time,order_time, gas_type, amount, gas_quatity, latx, laty, car_id, user_id,status, address, fuel_name, mark_path) VALUES (#{orderNum},#{orderCreatedTime},#{orderTime}, #{gasType}, #{amount}, #{gasQuatity}, #{latx}, #{laty}, #{carId}, #{userId},#{status}, #{address}, #{fuelName}, #{markPath})
mapper.update: UPDATE `order` SET order_num =#{orderNum}, order_time=#{orderTime}, gas_type=#{gasType}, amount=#{amount}, gas_quatity=#{gasQuatity}, latx=#{latx}, laty=#{laty} where id=#{id}
